title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pan of salted boiling water.
Meanwhile, fry the pancetta in a dry pan until crispy. Remove from heat.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix in the grated cheese and plenty of black pepper.
Drain the spaghetti, reserving some pasta water. Toss the hot pasta with the pancetta and the egg mixture off the heat (to prevent scrambling the eggs).
Add a splash of pasta water if needed to create a creamy sauce consistency. Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked through.
In a separate pan, prepare the sauce by simmering tomatoes, cream, and remaining spices.
Add the cooked chicken to the sauce and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, snap peas)
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add tougher vegetables (broccoli, carrots) first and stir fry for 2 minutes.
Add remaining vegetables and soy sauce, cook for another 3 minutes until tender-crisp.
Serve immediately.

title: Classic Cheeseburger
summary: A juicy beef patty with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and a special sauce on a bun.
instructions: Form beef into patties and season with salt and pepper.
Grill or pan-fry patties for 3-4 minutes per side.
Add a slice of cheese to each patty during the last minute of cooking, covering to melt.
Toast buns lightly.
Assemble burger with patty, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and condiments.
